page.title: 12The Fire Station
page.content: At the Brockenhurst Fire Station the firemen are part-time who work at other jobs during the day.They are called to the station by radio-bleeper which they carry 24 hours a day. Brockenhurst Fire Station has only one engine,which is a water tender unit carrying 240 gallons of water and used to support a ladder rescue unit. it's main function is to supply water to the rescue unit from Lymington.This one unit covers the area around {New {Milton, Beaulieu and Brockenhurst.} There are usually {5} men to a unit made up of a {Leading Fireman, a {Driver and 3 Firemen.} It usually takes 3-5 minutes from getting the firecall to getting the engine on the road.
